```{r}
source("DistanceBetweenRGBOrientations.R")

# Here is an example of how to use the angleBetweenRGBs function. Create 2 rgb arrays [0,255] and pass them into the function.
# The angle in degrees between the 2 orientations is returned.


rgb1 <- rgb(0,0,255)
rgb2 <- rgb(0,255,255)

print(angleBetweenRGBs(rgb1, rgb2))


```
